Reviews.Title: “Good, not great.”

Reviews.Content: friend hotel august 2011 clean beds okay hear traffic night expect istanbul city lot traffic breakfast easy travel tram metro nearby staff helpfull especially reception hotel

Reviews.Title: “A good option in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: TheJackalope
Reviews.Content: hearing horror stories hotels istanbul pleased choice book orient upgraded suite comfortable beds clean bathroom elevator friendly checkin staff breakfast delicious buffet able leave bags day checkout couple mention firstly id recommend booking online hotel stay night found price quoted reception decidedly paid online secondly cab drivers arent aware location map transport tram 5min walk arriving boat 5 min walk theres building road completely soundproof

Reviews.Title: “This is your hotel if you are just looking for good location...”
Reviews.Author: gudogn
Reviews.Content: decided stay hotel mainly recommendation local agent looking 3 star location hotel read hotel review prior booking reviews expecting extraordinary hotel breakfast service location agree dont wrong service fine special similar services anyway extra receptionist busy trying sell excursion forgetting service request location knowing write reveiw hotel timed distance apparently 3040 mins walk tourist attraction grand blue mosque hagia etc walk tram costs lira probably 2 lira dont didnt directly attractions minutes tram route following main straight road tram stop 2 minutes walk hotel 90 location hotel shortage restaurant coffee shops attractions hotel service average hotel forgot didnt notice window time noise night loading trunk night fortunately managed sleep night due walked exhausted everyday hear noise regardless realised window night close lot quieter hear noise credit cleaniness bathroom understand budget cleaniness usually dont mix worried bathroom situation clean disappointing breakfast read comments hotel mentioned greatness breakfast crazy breakfast expected disappointed time person usually sucker juice juice undrinkable didnt funny looking colour coffee machine constantly days stayed mornings breakfast everyday importance hotel location convenience clean bathroom day sightseeing hot shower clean bathroom guess ignore little noise evening breakfast honestly stay hotel dont pay hotel accommdation close windows night hotel definately choice

Reviews.Content: hotel centre main city service reception kindly helpfull 1 2 single beds airco breakfast love turkish local food boat trip day recommend beautiful thank crew time sightseeings istanbul night
